transcript: You're the manager. You don't know where you work for it. You don't know where you're at. You're the manager.

segments.text: You're the manager. You don't know where you work for it. You don't know where you're at. You're the manager.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: You're the manager? You don't know where you work for, you don't know where you're at and you're the manager?
